snippet: With the addition of the Toyota Prius Plug-In Hybrid, there is now an entire line of Priuses designed to be more attuned to middle-of-the-road Americans. In other words, the Prius has been Camryfied.
abstract: Latest addition to Toyota's expanding family of Prius hybrid vehicles is Plug-In Hybrid, designed to appeal to die-hard green customers who want to drive on grid-supplied energy.
lead_paragraph: With the addition of the Toyota Prius Plug-In Hybrid, there is now an entire line of Priuses designed to be more attuned to middle-of-the-road Americans. In other words, the Prius has been Camryfied.

headline.seo: And Plug-In Makes Four: Prius’s Expanding Family
headline.main: And Plug-In Makes Four: Prius’s Expanding Family
headline.print_headline: And Plug-In Makes Four: Prius’s Expanding Family
